secText:
Lesson:
1. Identify position, time, and [OBJ:expsec_c360:analyze slope in position-time graphs].
2. Calculate [OBJ:expsec_c361:velocity in position-time graphs.]
3. [OBJ:actsec_ya40:Match a position-time graph] using an understanding of displacement and time.
4. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_slime_question:analyze average and instantaneous velocities using a position-time graph].
5. [OBJ:actsec_ya45:Match a position-time graph] using an understanding of velocity.
6. Analyze [OBJ:expsec_c3611:acceleration using a position-time graph].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37420:Calculate] average velocity using a position-time graph.
